0010110001011111 0110011100100011 1 -> sum: 1001001110000011, cout: 0

0011011000000011 1010111110101110 1 -> sum: 1110010110110010, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
